title: Bugged Champ Select
body:
http://imgur.com/jQ7BCP5

Currently had this bug on the Champion Select where clicking one champion spell/masteries would instantaneously turn the screen dark. It pretty much blocks you from clicking anything around the League Client. Any thoughts or is this just a bug

Cheers in advance.

replies.body:
Hi Drillmored,

Thanks for letting us know about the problem - can you let me know some more details about your system - for example, what Operating System are you running?
but this **only** happened when the patch was taken into accordance
